name: safespot-monorepo
description: Comprehensive tourist safety platform with blockchain authentication and AI-powered features

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../smart-contracts && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:contracts && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test:all: npm run test:contracts && npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:backend -- --coverage && npm run test:frontend -- --coverage
scripts.lint: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../backend && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd frontend && npm run lint -- --fix && cd ../backend && npm run lint -- --fix
scripts.typecheck: cd frontend && npm run typecheck && cd ../backend && npx tsc --noEmit
scripts.format: cd frontend && npm run format && cd ../backend && npm run format
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run clean:dist && npm run install:all
scripts.deploy:contracts: cd smart-contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network mainnet
scripts.deploy:contracts:testnet: cd smart-contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network sepolia
scripts.migrate:db: cd backend && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.migrate:db:dev: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.security:audit: cd frontend && npm audit && cd ../backend && npm audit && cd ../smart-contracts && npm audit
scripts.security:audit:fix: cd frontend && npm audit fix && cd ../backend && npm audit fix && cd ../smart-contracts && npm audit fix
scripts.precommit: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run test:all
